Dear Parents,
Today, there will be guidance given from the NJ Department of Education on how schools can safely begin to reopen in the fall. One thing that is 100% predictable is that everyone will not be happy with all parts of this plan. However, our attitude we present to our children will ultimately decide whether they are anxious, worried, and angry OR smiling, confident, and ready to learn in September. Our reopening committee is ready to create our plan and I have all of the confidence in the world that no matter what this plan entails, our school community will do what it needs to do this fall to keep us moving in the right direction. Enjoy your weekend everyone! - Jack Marcellus
